valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 987 expected just west of Rockall 1001 by 1800 Sunday. New low expected Biscay 996 by same time

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In west, northwesterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first. In east, cyclonic 4 to 6, occasionally 3 at first then increasing 7 at times.
Sea state
In west, very rough or high. in east, very rough, occasionally high until later.
Weather
In west, squally thundery showers. In east, showers, perhaps thundery.
Visibility
In west, moderate or poor. In east, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
